Summary: I could only see a light it was at night moving in an unatural pattern
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago

divs: sighting detailsmy husband was watching nba game 2 on tnt live 4\18\11. the video was captured on time lapse of a citysacape at the end of the game. as all of the cars and lights were movig fast there was a light in the sky that moved back an forth and seemed to hover for a long time since it was time lapse i cannot say how long it was there then is moved very fast to a different location the shot straight up. i have this on my dvr but i dont know how to send it to an email or any of that but i would really like to know what it was.
